channel.title: Using hamachi!
channel.description: :) ok i need some1 to help me using hamachi like how to join server, how do i kno if its online or offlie and all i need to kno, well not all but ssome stuff bout it. :P

item.title: Using hamachi!
item.dc:creator: @Maiden Maiden
item.description:
@Maiden wrote:

To Join a NetWork, You must know the NetWork Name and teh Password, enter them and go at Moparscape and Enter the Ip that your friend will give you. Now you will be in your friend server.

To know if its online or not,There a Green Spot next of the Server Name. When its offline, its a Gray spot.

Hope its helped.

Read full topic
